text: Is there any plan to implement a BVP-DAE solver in DifferentialEquations.jl? If not, any guidance on the best practice to exploit the current tools to solve BVP-DAE?

elements.text: Is there any plan to implement a BVP-DAE solver in DifferentialEquations.jl? If not, any guidance on the best practice to exploit the current tools to solve BVP-DAE?

text: asking because many macroeconomic models are essentially BVP-DAE so it would be really handy if that could be solved directly with the package
